articles.title: DVDs and public transit: Boycott drives people to ditch Big Tech to protest ICE - NPR
articles.description: A sweeping boycott has begun — targeting tech giants who participants believe are enabling President Trump and his immigration crackdown.
articles.content: In Portland, Ore., Brittany Trahan started buying DVDs rather than paying for Netflix and Apple TV, while Lisa Shannon has been relying on public transit instead of taking an Uber. And in McDonough, … [+7838 chars]
